content.name: DeadAir Gate Overhaul
content.description:
DeadAirGate Overhaul
Adds 105 new sectors - Major factions are split into 7 core systems and multiple border systems - Minor factions are split into 4 core systems - Adds neutral sector(s) between major factions - Removes all highways and super highways - Replaces all gates and provides increased connections between systems - Improves universe spawning for a war heavy games - Adjusts amount of stations - Adjusts critical stations to spawn in faction's core systems - Improves NPC jobs for a war heavy gamestart - Adjusts ship limits for galaxy and sector (more ships, larger fleets, stronger economy) - Adds critical economy jobs that will always rebuild if lost - AI ships use faction paint mods - Improves L/XL travel scripts - Increases trade allotted relative price for AI jobs (more goods moved) - Changes autotrader skill requirement to level 1 and adjusts jump ranges - Reorganizes AI ware baskets - Improves drone loadout of AI ships - HAT/ALI/SCA/MIN have complete economy - Removes spawning of ships except khaak - Factions will build an additional tradestation for intermediate good if economy is strong - Factions will police their own space - HAT/ALI/SCA/MIN have their own space and faction logic
Works best with mod: Faction Fix Pack by Mysterial
If not using, requires new game. If using old versions (v0.79 or older), then v0.80 or newer requires new game. Else, enjoy updates.
Installation: make sure folder is named "deadairgateoverhaul" or you will have blacked out sectors.
Patch notes available on: https://github.com/DeadAirRT
Best place to contact me: https://forum.egosoft.com/viewtopic.php?f=181&t=415937
content.author: DeadAir

text.name: DeadAir Gate Overhaul
text.description:
DeadAirGate Overhaul
Adds 105 new sectors - Major factions are split into 7 core systems and multiple border systems - Minor factions are split into 4 core systems - Adds neutral sector(s) between major factions - Removes all highways and super highways - Replaces all gates and provides increased connections between systems - Improves universe spawning for a war heavy games - Adjusts amount of stations - Adjusts critical stations to spawn in faction's core systems - Improves NPC jobs for a war heavy gamestart - Adjusts ship limits for galaxy and sector (more ships, larger fleets, stronger economy) - Adds critical economy jobs that will always rebuild if lost - AI ships use faction paint mods - Improves L/XL travel scripts - Increases trade allotted relative price for AI jobs (more goods moved) - Changes autotrader skill requirement to level 1 and adjusts jump ranges - Reorganizes AI ware baskets - Improves drone loadout of AI ships - HAT/ALI/SCA/MIN have complete economy - Removes spawning of ships except khaak - Factions will build an additional tradestation for intermediate good if economy is strong - Factions will police their own space - HAT/ALI/SCA/MIN have their own space and faction logic
Works best with mod: Faction Fix Pack by Mysterial
If not using, requires new game. If using old versions (v0.79 or older), then v0.80 or newer requires new game. Else, enjoy updates.
Installation: make sure folder is named "deadairgateoverhaul" or you will have blacked out sectors.
Patch notes available on: https://github.com/DeadAirRT
Best place to contact me: https://forum.egosoft.com/viewtopic.php?f=181&t=415937
text.author: DeadAir

text.name: DeadAir Gate Overhaul
text.description:
DeadAirGate Overhaul
Ajoute 105 nouveaux secteurs - Les factions majeures sont divisées en 7 systèmes de base et en plusieurs systèmes de frontière - Les factions mineures sont divisées en 4 systèmes de base - Ajoute un ou plusieurs secteurs neutres entre les factions majeures - Supprime toutes les autoroutes et super-autoroutes - Remplace toutes les portes et fournit des connexions accrues entre les systèmes - Améliore le fraite de l'univers pour les guerres lourds - Ajuste le nombre de stations - Ajuste les stations critiques pour qu'elles se reproduisent dans les systèmes de base des factions - Améliore les emplois des PNJ pour un début de guerre - Ajuste les limites des navires pour la galaxie et les secteurs (plus de navires, plus grandes flottes, économie plus forte) - Ajout d'emplois économiques essentiels qui seront toujours reconstruits en cas de perte - Les navires AI utilisent des mods de peinture de faction - Amélioration des scripts de voyage L/XL - Augmentation du prix relatif alloué au commerce pour les emplois AI (plus de biens déplacés) - Modification des compétences requises pour l'autotrader au niveau 1 et ajustement des plages de saut - Réorganisation des paniers d'articles AI - Améliore le chargement des navires AI par les drones - HAT/ALI/SCA/MIN ont une économie complète - Supprime le fraite des navires à l'exception du khaak - Factions construira une station de commerce supplémentaire pour les biens intermédiaires si l'économie est forte - Les factions surveilleront leur propre espace - La HAT/ALI/SCA/MIN ont leur propre espace et leur propre logique de faction
- Fonctionne mieux avec le mod : Faction Fix Pack de Mysterial
Si non utilisé, nécessite un nouveau jeu. Si vous utilisez une ancienne version (v0.79 ou plus ancienne), alors la v0.80 ou plus récente nécessite un nouveau jeu. Sinon, profitez des mises à jour.
Installation: assurez-vous que le dossier est nommé "deadairgateoverhaul" ou vous aurez des secteurs NOIRE.
Patch notes disponibles sur: https://github.com/DeadAirRT
Le meilleur endroit pour me contacter: https://forum.egosoft.com/viewtopic.php?f=181&t=415937
text.author: DeadAir

text.name: DeadAir Gate Overhaul
text.description:
DeadAirGate Overhaul
Adds 105 new sectors - Major factions are split into 7 core systems and multiple border systems - Minor factions are split into 4 core systems - Adds neutral sector(s) between major factions - Removes all highways and super highways - Replaces all gates and provides increased connections between systems - Improves universe spawning for a war heavy games - Adjusts amount of stations - Adjusts critical stations to spawn in faction's core systems - Improves NPC jobs for a war heavy gamestart - Adjusts ship limits for galaxy and sector (more ships, larger fleets, stronger economy) - Adds critical economy jobs that will always rebuild if lost - AI ships use faction paint mods - Improves L/XL travel scripts - Increases trade allotted relative price for AI jobs (more goods moved) - Changes autotrader skill requirement to level 1 and adjusts jump ranges - Reorganizes AI ware baskets - Improves drone loadout of AI ships - HAT/ALI/SCA/MIN have complete economy - Removes spawning of ships except khaak - Factions will build an additional tradestation for intermediate good if economy is strong - Factions will police their own space - HAT/ALI/SCA/MIN have their own space and faction logic
Works best with mod: Faction Fix Pack by Mysterial
If not using, requires new game. If using old versions (v0.79 or older), then v0.80 or newer requires new game. Else, enjoy updates.
Installation: make sure folder is named "deadairgateoverhaul" or you will have blacked out sectors.
Patch notes available on: https://github.com/DeadAirRT
Best place to contact me: https://forum.egosoft.com/viewtopic.php?f=181&t=415937
